src:
Nigerian firefighters battle huge blaze in central Lagos
05 Nov 2019, 13:01 by The Associated Press, Staff
LAGOS, Nigeria -- Nigerian firefighters are trying to extinguish a fire at the Balogun market in central Lagos.
Thick black smoke and flames are shooting from five-storey buildings surrounding the market as fire trucks attempt to get access to the fire.
Residents have thrown what belongings they can from the buildings, and some on the rooftops used small buckets of water in an attempt to stop the spread of the fire Tuesday.


Image from video of the fire at the Balogun market in central Lagos, Nigeria. (source: AP)
